name: Flask of Petrification
tooltip:
Flask of Petrification
Item Level 60
Requires Level 50
Use: You turn to stone, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for 1 min, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells.  You can only have the effect of one flask at a time. (3 Sec Cooldown)
Max Stack: 5
Sell Price: 50
